name: Mortgage Insurance Rental and Cooperative Housing for Moderate Income Families and Elderly, Market Interest Rate
popular_name: New Construction or Substantial Rehabilitation of Rental Housing -221(d)(4)
objective: Section 221(d)(4) insures mortgage loans to facilitate the new construction or substantial rehabilitation of multifamily rental or cooperative housing for moderate-income families, elderly, and the handicapped. Single Room Occupancy (SRO) projects may also be insured under this section. (See program 14.184).
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Assistant Secretary for Housing -- Federal Housing Commissioner
assistance_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: National Housing Act, as amended, Section 221, Public Law 86-372, 12 U.S.C. 17151 (d)(4).

rules_regulations: 24 CFR 221 et seq.  The Multifamily Accelerated  Processing (MAP) Guide is on the web.  Refer to HUD's MAP page at http://www.hud.gov/offices/hsg/mfh/map/maphome.cfm.
